definitions.definition: a mass of very small drops of liquid carried in the air:
examples: Can you feel the spray from the sea/waterfall?

definitions.definition: a liquid that is forced out of a special container under pressure so that it becomes a mass of small liquid drops like a cloud:
a mass of small drops of liquid spread onto plants and crops, etc. from a special piece of equipment, or the piece of equipment itself:
examples: Farmers use a lot of chemical sprays on crops.

definitions.definition: a single small branch or stem with leaves and flowers on it:
examples: All the wedding guests wore sprays of carnations.
